item.title: Getting started with casperjs
item.description: Installation or Setup # Detailed instructions on getting casperjs set up or installed. First program to getting started # var casper = require('casper').create(); casper.start('http://casperjs.org/'); casper.then(function() { this.echo('First Page: ' + this.getTitle()); }); casper.thenOpen('http://phantomjs.org', function() { this.echo('Second Page: ' + this.getTitle()); }); casper.run();
